title: I Know they can get me pregnant (TEFC)
brief_description: Would-be mothers, patients at the In-Vitro Fertilisation Clinic at the Royal North Shore Hospital, describe their feelings. This program provides material for discussion on such topics as the role of the social worker, the ethics of test-tube babies and the care of patients.
